description:
Classical Masterpiece songs that everyone has heard…
But do you actually know the title?

In this game, by solving 
music challenge quiz 
and
Four choice quiz,
You can deepen your classical music knowledge.

In “ Easy mode”, you can challenge the standard quiz!
In “ Challenge mode”, you can challenge the music introduction-challenge quiz!

“ Which song is “for Elise”? ”
“ Is this the “Swan Lake”? ”
Too hard? Don’t worry, “HINT”s will help you out!

If you answer correctly, you can read the fun facts of the songs and in addition,
“Archive” Mode let’s you listen the masterpieces and even let’s you review the quiz. 

Even if you are a classic music experts, or beginners who wants to start learning,
you can take your time alone, or play with your friends and families...
Let’s learn the world of “classical music”, just like a brain training!

The game supports both button controls and touch controls, so you can play in TV Mode, Handheld Mode, or Tabletop Mode.
name: EASY LEARNING CLASSICAL MUSIC
